imdb.plot outline: hDGch : History of Graphic Design in Chile FONDART winning documentary series National CNCA , runs the main references , products and contexts that have given life to our country to the project activity and communicate through images. Based on the book by Pedro Alvarez Caselli (Editorial PUC School of Design - Award Altazor 2005 ), five chapters structure a narrative describing the origins of the design and its link to the domestic industry in the early nineteenth century , the development and professionalization of graphic discipline from the second half of the twentieth century , and its present condition as interdisciplinary subject responsible for delivering products, systems and services that contribute to the cultural imagination and development.
imdb.title: hDGch - Historia del diseño gráfico en Chile
akas: hDGch - Historia del diseño gráfico en Chile (Chile)
plot: hDGch : History of Graphic Design in Chile FONDART winning documentary series National CNCA , runs the main references , products and contexts that have given life to our country to the project activity and communicate through images. Based on the book by Pedro Alvarez Caselli (Editorial PUC School of Design - Award Altazor 2005 ), five chapters structure a narrative describing the origins of the design and its link to the domestic industry in the early nineteenth century , the development and professionalization of graphic discipline from the second half of the twentieth century , and its present condition as interdisciplinary subject responsible for delivering products, systems and services that contribute to the cultural imagination and development.::dereojo comunicaciones
